benefit: When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you gain a +1 bonus to speed until the end of your turn. You also gain a +2 bonus to all Diplomacy checks.
flavor: A free-wheeling, high energy trade port that is the most wealthy and prosperous of the independent mercantile cities known as the Windrise Ports, Tarmaluneâ€™s cosmopolitan air provides a welcome atmosphere to adventurers laden with coin.
name: Tarmalune
